name: Karma (itch) (Harugot)
description:
Karma is a 2-D dodger game. The main goal is to complete all 8 levels and compete for a high score. Gain points by collecting striped blocks and by narrowly avoiding solid blocks and spikes. Karma uses a point system that rewards risk taking - such as staying at as low health as possible. In addition, points gained in the ending section of each level will be put towards points used to continue - but be warned, if you run out of lives, the game will start over.

Use the arrow keys or click to move the orb.

Press "F" to toggle fullscreen.

PS. There are a few cheats in the game - one of which has the possibility to break it - so cheat responsibly.

PS.PS - IF THE GAME IS WAY TOO FAST TO PLAY TRY RELAUNCHING IT IN A WINDOW ON MEDIUM QUALITY!
